TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed TFCore extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains TensorFlow fundamental methods and utility functions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class TensorFlow.TFBuffer GetAllOpList() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves the ProtocolBuffer describing all of the available operations in the TensorFlow library in current use.
Docs.returns: The buffer contains a ProtocolBuffer encoded payload, you need a ProtocolBuffer reader to process the contents.

MemberSignature.Value: public static TensorFlow.TFBuffer GetAllRegisteredKernels (TensorFlow.TFStatus status = null);
.method public static hidebysig class TensorFlow.TFBuffer GetAllRegisteredKernels(class TensorFlow.TFStatus status) cil managed

Docs.param: Status buffer, if specified a status code will be left here, if not specified, a exception is raised if there is an error.
Docs.summary: Returns a serialized KernelList protocol buffer containing KernelDefs for all registered kernels

MemberSignature.Value: public static TensorFlow.TFBuffer GetAllRegisteredKernels (string name, TensorFlow.TFStatus status = null);
.method public static hidebysig class TensorFlow.TFBuffer GetAllRegisteredKernels(string name, class TensorFlow.TFStatus status) cil managed

Docs.param: Status buffer, if specified a status code will be left here, if not specified, a exception is raised if there is an error.
Docs.summary: Returns a serialized KernelList protocol buffer containing KernelDefs for all kernels registered for the operation specified.
Docs.returns: The registered kernels for the specified operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig int64 GetDataTypeSize(valuetype TensorFlow.TFDataType dt) cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the size in bytes of the specified TensorFlow data type.
Returns the version of the TensorFlow runtime in use.
